sourcesContent: import{useRef as e,useEffect as n}from"react";export default function(t,r,i,o){void 0===i&&(i=global),void 0===o&&(o={});var c=e(),u=o.capture,a=o.passive,v=o.once;n(function(){c.current=r},[r]),n(function(){if(i&&i.addEventListener){var e=function(e){return c.current(e)},n={capture:u,passive:a,once:v};return i.addEventListener(t,e,n),function(){i.removeEventListener(t,e,n)}}},[t,i,u,a,v])}
